title.narrative: JUSTICE FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: By 2020, the justice and protection systems have increased capacity to provide children and adolescents in contact with the law with a second chance., which contributes to Access To Justice, Access To Justice (Covid), Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Data And Child Protection, Justice For Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participationBy 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participation.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, the justice and protection systems have increased capacity to provide children and adolescents in contact with the lawwith a second chance.

description.narrative: Support to children in contact with the law continued, including through specialized services and interventions tailored for COVID-19, new partnerships between the CSOs and MoJ were established, and knowledge generation and analysis in the field of access to justice was emphasised. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2021

title.narrative: Existence of specialized justice for children systems, such as capacity building and standards-setting within criminal and civil justice systems, Text

baseline.value: Administration of specialized justice for children systems is not existent

target.value: 2020:An administrative body to oversee JFC policies is established and operational Knowledge and capacity is enhanced on diversion and alternatives of imprisonment for children in Turkey.

actual.value: 2020:JFC Administrative body: entity in charge of justice for children at MoJ is established by Presidential Decree and operationalization is ongoing.

title.narrative: Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms(61244), Text

baseline.value: Child friendly services for child in contact with the law are delivered in 30 Judicial Interview Rooms for Children (JIRC) in 23 provinces

target.value: 2020:Services for child in contact with the law are delivered in 68 Judicial Interview Rooms for Children (JIRC) in 55 provinces.

actual.value: 2020:Services for child in contact with the law are delivered in 90 Judicial Interview Rooms for Children (JIRC) in 70 provinces. UNICEF's child friendly legal aid guidelines are adopted and disseminated in 81 Bar Associations
